prompt: Schematic of model domain denoting two frame of reference points. Origin for the full frame is cartesian $(x,z)$and sets the origin directly beneath the south pole of the drop and aligned to an unperturbed bath free surface. The droplet will be evolved in a moving frame of reference with polar coordinates ($r,\theta)$ centred at the centre of mass of a drop whose free surface lies at $r=R_0$, and $\theta=0$ pointing vertically downwards towards the bath.
